verbs.description: south carolina bentley look for faster start vs mississippi south carolina quarterback jake bentley [V: ca] n't understand why he and the gamecocks start so slow and finish so strong he just glad they do it just the resiliency of this team that we 're going to keep fighting bentley said tuesday south carolina 4 - 3 3 - 3 southeastern conference hopes to get off to a quicker start this saturday at mississippi 5 - 3 1 - 3 the gamecocks have trailed at halftime in five of their six sec games yet rallied to victory in two of their past three league contests including a 27 - 24 win over tennessee after falling behind 21 - 9 in the third quarter gamecocks mississippi bentley jake bentley tennessee sec will muschamp south carolina
